get.description:
Returns comprehensive admission statistics and analytics for the admin dashboard.

**Statistics included:**
- **Status Stats**: Admission counts grouped by status (UNVERIFIED, VERIFIED, REJECTED)
- **Gender Stats**: Admission counts grouped by student gender (MALE, FEMALE)
- **Class Level Stats**: Admission counts per class level with code, name, and gender
- **Area Stats**: Admissions per area with year-over-year comparison (thisYear vs lastYear)
- **Group Stats**: Admissions grouped by class level group with male/female breakdown

**Funnel metrics:**
- Total admissions count
- Breakdown by status (unverified/verified/rejected)
- Fee paid count and finalized count
- Interaction submitted count (students who completed teacher interaction)
- Bottleneck indicators: verified-but-not-fee-paid, fee-paid-but-not-finalized

**Conversion rates:**
- Fee paid rate (% of total)
- Finalized rate (% of total)
- Interaction submitted rate (% of total)

**Averages:**
- Average days from admission creation to fee payment
- Average days from admission creation to finalization

**Time series (for charts):**
- Day-by-day admissions created count for the specified date range
- Day-by-day interactions submitted count for the specified date range
- Returns continuous series including zero-count days for proper chart rendering

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: Filter statistics by a specific session ID. If omitted, aggregates across all sessions.

parameters.name: branchId
parameters.description: Filter statistics by a specific branch ID. If omitted, aggregates across all branches.

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of days for the recent trend time series (recentTrend). The API returns a day-by-day series from (today - days + 1) to today. Useful for rendering admission/interaction charts.

optional-jwt.description: Optional: Enter JWT token for user or admin authentication

name.description: The name of the admin user

email.description: The email of the admin user

count.description: Number of admissions in this status
Number of admissions for this gender

gender.description: Gender this class level is designated for

count.description: Number of admissions in this class level

thisYear.description: Number of admissions this year (current session)

lastYear.description: Number of admissions from last year (stored in area.lastYearTotal)

percentage.description: Year-over-year growth percentage formatted as string (e.g., "120.00%")

maleCount.description: Number of male students in this group

femaleCount.description: Number of female students in this group

totalStudents.description: Total students in this group (maleCount + femaleCount)

maleCount.description: Number of male students in this class level

femaleCount.description: Number of female students in this class level

totalStudents.description: Total students in this class level (maleCount + femaleCount)

feePaidCount.description: Number of students who have paid fee in this class level

feeNotPaidCount.description: Number of students who have not paid fee in this class level

totalStudents.description: Total students in this class level

classes.description: Fee stats for each Tiflan class (both genders combined)

total.description: Total expected and confirmed for Tiflan

classes.description: Fee stats for each Muhiban class

total.description: Total expected and confirmed for this Muhiban gender

genders.description: Fee stats for each gender in Nasiran

total.description: Total expected and confirmed for Nasiran

tiflan.description: Tiflan fee card - all classes regardless of gender

muhibanBoys.description: Muhiban Boys fee card - boys classes only

muhibanGirls.description: Muhiban Girls fee card - girls classes only

nasiran.description: Nasiran fee card - breakdown by gender

unverified.description: Number of admissions in UNVERIFIED status (pending document verification)

verified.description: Number of admissions in VERIFIED status (documents approved)

rejected.description: Number of admissions in REJECTED status

feePaid.description: Number of admissions where fee has been paid

finalized.description: Number of admissions that have been finalized (enrollment complete)

interactionSubmitted.description: Number of admissions where teacher interaction has been submitted

verifiedNotFeePaid.description: Number of VERIFIED admissions that have NOT paid fee yet. Identifies students stuck after verification.

feePaidNotFinalized.description: Number of fee-paid admissions that have NOT been finalized yet. Identifies students stuck after payment.

feePaidRate.description: Percentage of total admissions that have paid fee (0-100, rounded to 2 decimals)

finalizedRate.description: Percentage of total admissions that have been finalized (0-100, rounded to 2 decimals)

interactionSubmittedRate.description: Percentage of total admissions that have completed teacher interaction (0-100, rounded to 2 decimals)

avgDaysToFeePaid.description: Average number of days from admission creation to fee payment. Null if no fee-paid admissions exist.

avgDaysToFinalized.description: Average number of days from admission creation to finalization. Null if no finalized admissions exist.

admissionsCreated.description: Number of admissions created on this date

interactionsSubmitted.description: Number of teacher interactions submitted on this date

generatedAt.description: Timestamp when this dashboard data was generated

days.description: Number of days in the recentTrend time series

genderStats.description: Admission counts grouped by student gender

classLevelStats.description: Admission counts grouped by class level

areaStats.description: Admission counts grouped by area with year-over-year comparison

groupStats.description: Admission counts grouped by class level group with gender breakdown

classGenderStats.description: Admission counts grouped by class level (e.g. KG, Grade 1) with male/female breakdown

classFeeStats.description: Admission counts grouped by class level (e.g. KG, Grade 1) with fee paid/not paid breakdown

feeCardStats.description: Fee card stats for the 4 frontend cards (Tiflan, Muhiban Boys, Muhiban Girls, Nasiran)

funnel.description: Funnel metrics showing admission progression and bottlenecks

rates.description: Conversion rate percentages for key milestones

averages.description: Average time metrics for admission process steps

recentTrend.description: Day-by-day time series of admissions created and interactions submitted. Includes all days in the range (including zero-count days) for proper chart rendering.

questions.description: Replace all questions when provided (full replacement)
